summary: Mod change the meshes and textures for trees on Skyrim, and add really detailed LOD for trees.
descriptionHtml:
You too dont like the ugly bad textured and skinny trees?
If yes, i have a really good mod for you!


[u][b]What it do?:[/b][/u]
This mod change the meshes and textures for trees on Skyrim, and add really detailed LOD for trees.
So it add to game more realism. ;)

Small version on Steam workshop:
http://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/?id=388458433


[u][b]Compatibility:[/b][/u]
1. Add new trees to skyrim.
2. All Grass mods.
3. LOD Mods for terrain and objects.


[u][b]No Compatibility:[/b][/u]
1. Mods who contain new meshes and textures for trees.
2. Mods who change the LOD for trees.

This mod are modelled on models and textures from [b][u]Skyrim Flora Overhaul[/u][/b]
If you use allready: [b][u]Skyrim [/u][/b][b]Flora Overhaul[/b] but you like my LOD you can download and install it it will work without problems :)

[u][b]Installation:
[/b][/u]1. Download the file from nexus. ;)
2. Unpack it
3. Paste the meshes and textures catalog to your Skyrim Data folder.


[u][b]Uninstallation:[/b][/u]
1. Delete the catalog "Trees" form Data>meshes>terrain>Tamriel
2. Delete the catalog "trees" form Data>meshes>landscape
3. Delete the catalog "Trees" form Data>textures>terrain>Tamriel
4. Delete the catalog "trees" form Data>testures>landscape

[b][u]Credits[/u]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/41808]vurt[/url] & team - really thanks for premission to use your's trees models ;)
RavenKZP  [/b]
author: RavenKZP
